answers.author: Jerene Watson
answers.text:
Paul Summerfelt, Wildland Fire Manager, in our Flagstaff (AZ) Fire Department has worked extensively with USFS and our local university in a 4-forest partnership.  I am not certain if timber sales have been part of their discussions or not, but his contact information is:  928-213-2509.  He would be a wealth of information.

author: Mark Abeles-Allison
text: I am trying to learn more about the USFS Stewardship program and how local communities can benefit from this type of timber sale.  Please let me know if your community has participated in it.  Thank you.
title: Forest Stewardship
